nodes.text: During his time as a champion of the Mandalorian warrior clans, Jicoln Cadera owned and wielded a beskad. The beskar sword was decorated with the skulls of felled warriors, and bore a hilt adorned with the skull of a ferocious Krayt dragon, symbolizing the hunger for war and destruction prized by Mandalorians of the era.
Jicoln Cadera's beskad first appeared in the massively multiplayer online game Star Wars: The Old Republic, created by BioWare and released December 2011.
